definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: At intervals formal receptions were held at the governor's mansion.
sentences.chinese: 總督府中不時舉行正式酒會。

sentences.english: She wore a sexy see-through blouse to the cocktail party.
sentences.chinese: 她穿一件性感透明的上衣去參加雞尾酒會。

sentences.english: Offer a signature cocktail instead of an open bar.
sentences.chinese: 提供簽名雞尾酒會而非免費酒吧。

sentences.english: You don't have to wear swallowtail for the semiformal opening party.
sentences.chinese: 你不必穿燕尾服參加半正式的開幕酒會。

sentences.english: No one mentions the dreaded word sub - prime over cocktails at Centro or "M on the Bund".
sentences.chinese: 沒人在酒廊和餐廳的酒會上提起次貸這個可怕的詞。

sentences.english: In Paris, cocktail parties offer good opportunities for making friends.
sentences.chinese: 在巴黎，雞尾酒會是廣交朋友的好機會。

sentences.english: Red wines, on the other hand, usually start out very deep and dark purple.
sentences.chinese: 紅葡萄酒正好相反，新酒會是很深很濃的紫色。

sentences.english: They took possession. As if they were at a cocktail reception.
sentences.chinese: 他們佔據了舞臺，他們恍如就在雞尾酒會的接待入口。

sentences.english: Sam: Is it customary to remain standing at cocktail parties?
sentences.chinese: 一般參加雞尾酒會都是站着的嗎？

sentences.english: The guests at the cocktail party were gabbling away.
sentences.chinese: 客人們在雞尾酒會上一直談個不停。

sentences.english: It's the best choose that fill a prescription of each type of facility.
sentences.chinese: 是糖酒會調劑各種類型場館的最佳選擇。

sentences.english: Drinks and hors d''oeuvres or snacks are usually served.
sentences.chinese: 酒會上通常招待各種飲料和開胃小喫或點心。

sentences.english: For the first, he threw a lavish church wedding and reception dinner.
sentences.chinese: 他爲大女兒辦了一個奢華的教堂婚禮和招待酒會。

sentences.english: Drinks and hors d'oeuvres or snacks are usually served.
sentences.chinese: 酒會上通常招待各種飲料和開胃小喫或點心。

sentences.english: Jerell Scott - Tablecloth, lawn chairs, cocktail umbrellas and koosh ball.
sentences.chinese: 桌布，草坪椅，酒會紙傘，彈性橡膠球。

sentences.english: “It’d be like having a virtual cocktail party, ” he says.
sentences.chinese: “這就像一個虛擬的雞尾酒會，”他說。

definition: meeting place/place where people gather/CL:個|个[ge4]
